roleset.name: suitable, appropriate
roleset.note: PROPER-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. Comparison to appropriate-j.01. (from proper.01-j)

example.name: Arg1 only, with It exp
example.text: It *EXP* is only right and proper that we equip our children with the language skills of the central European powers - French , German and Spanish .
example.arg: that we equip our children with the language skills of the central European powers - French , German and Spanish .

example.name: All args
example.text: What-1 I thought *-1 was proper for battle, I see now is proper for love.
